content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found related to copper cable factory

### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5 y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5 y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of transport-belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport-belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel to operate
- Ensure that burner entities are connected to the correct input/output entities

### Errors when using inserter entities
- Ensure that inserter entities have source items to operate
- Ensure that inserter entities are connected to the correct input/output entities

### Errors when using furnace entities
- Ensure that furnace entities have ingredients to operate
- Ensure that furnace entities are connected to the correct input/output entities

### Errors when using steam engine entities
- Ensure that steam engine entities are connected to the electric network

### Errors when using offshore pump entities
- Ensure that offshore pump entities have a connected pipe group

### Errors when using pipe group entities
- Ensure that pipe group entities are connected to the correct input/output entities

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
